actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of Eppes Manor to Petersburg National Battlefield, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Eppes Manor and adjacent lands for addition to the Petersburg National Battlefield, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of Eppes Manor to Petersburg National Battlefield, and for other purposes.
